response.overview: A self-destructive woman, teetering on the edge of emotional collapse, checks herself into a secluded, week-long rehab for sex addiction. Her plan is simple—stay guarded, resist intimacy, and endure the program without letting anyone get too close. But the retreat is unlike anything she expected. Behind closed doors, the other women begin to share raw, unfiltered confessions—stories laced with pain, desire, shame, and survival.  Each revelation chips away at her carefully built walls, pulling her into a current of vulnerability she’s desperate to avoid. As the week intensifies, the line between therapy and temptation blurs, forcing her to navigate a minefield of emotional triggers and erotic tension. In the end, she must face a devastating choice: confront the darkest truth she has buried deep within herself… or remain forever trapped in a relentless cycle of denial, desire, and self-destruction..  How far will you go?
response.title: Hard Stop
